```{r}
library(Mreport)
```


## 收费站数据准备

```{r}
hljsfstation <- read.csv("D:\\data\\sfsj\\sf_station.csv",stringsAsFactors = F)
hljsfstation <- hljsfstation[,c(1:7)]
hljsfstation <- hljsfstation[1:183,c(2,3,5,6)]
hljsfstation <- na.omit(hljsfstation)
names(hljsfstation) <- c("popup","label","lng","lat")
hljsfstation$type <- "sf"
hljsfstation[hljsfstation$label=="卜奎站","lng"] <- 123.969335
```


```{r}
geo_pointplot(hljsfstation,type=T,popup = ~popup)
```

## 交调数据准备

```{r}
hljjdstation <- read.csv("D:\\data\\sfsj\\黑龙江已有交调站.csv",stringsAsFactors = F)
dim(hljjdstation)
```

```{r}
names(hljjdstation)
```

```{r}
hljjdstation <- hljjdstation[,c(2,3,15,16)]
str(hljjdstation)
```

```{r}
hljjdstation <- na.omit(hljjdstation)
dim(hljjdstation)
```

```{r}
names(hljjdstation) <- c("popup","label","lng","lat")
hljjdstation$popup <- as.character(hljjdstation$popup)
hljjdstation$type <- "jd"
```

```{r}
hljallstation <- rbind(hljjdstation,hljsfstation)
```

```{r}
geo_pointplot(hljallstation,type=T,popup = ~popup)
```
